title: Mobile App Development
description: Learn how to design, build, and publish mobile apps for Android and iOS. Understand UI design principles and responsive layouts. Explore frameworks like Flutter and React Native for cross-platform development.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: Start from scratch and master front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build responsive and dynamic websites with frameworks like Bootstrap. Gain hands-on experience in creating real-world projects for the web.

title: Artificial Intelligence Basics
description: Get introduced to the exciting field of AI and machine learning. Understand how algorithms can make decisions and learn from data. Explore neural networks, data analysis, and practical AI applications in daily life.

title: Computer Science Fundamentals
description: Dive into the world of computing and understand how software and hardware interact. Learn the logic behind algorithms, data structures, and programming basics. Develop problem-solving skills essential for every software engineer.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Learn how to protect systems, networks, and users from cyber threats. Understand common attack types, encryption, and ethical hacking basics. Develop skills to keep personal and organizational data safe online.

title: Data Science & Analytics
description: Discover how to collect, clean, and analyze data to make smart decisions. Learn Python, Excel, and data visualization tools like Power BI. Turn raw data into meaningful insights through real-world datasets.

title: Cloud Computing
description: Understand how cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud work. Learn about storage, deployment, and virtualization. Gain the skills needed to deploy modern scalable applications in the cloud.

title: UI/UX Design
description: Explore the process of designing user-friendly and attractive interfaces. Learn about color theory, typography, and layout design. Understand how user research and wireframing lead to effective digital experiences.

title: Networking Fundamentals
description: Build a strong foundation in computer networking concepts. Learn how devices communicate, how data travels, and how to configure routers and switches. Practice with Cisco tools and real-world network simulations.
